Package com.ultreon.bubbles.game

Class GameWindow

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.bubbles.game.GameWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentListener, WindowFocusListener, WindowListener, WindowStateListener, EventListener
public class GameWindow extends Object implements WindowListener, WindowFocusListener, WindowStateListener, ComponentListener
Window class for the game's window.
